welcome_message_body: Welcome to Batu, Indonesia! Known for its cool climate and stunning natural scenery, this charming city is the perfect place to relax and explore. We invite you to enjoy everything Batu has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your visit.

restaurants.name: Bebek Goreng H. Slamet
restaurants.description: Bebek Goreng H. Slamet is a indonesian restaurant located in Batu.
restaurants.address: Jl. Kartini No. 7, Batu, Jawa Timur 65325
